Class UserInterface

java.lang.Object
  UserInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class UserInterface
extends Object
implements ActionListener

This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a text entry area, a text output area and an optional image. View ?? The view recognizes that a GUI action for example, pushing a button or dragging a scroll bar has occurred, using a listener method that is registered to be called when such an action occurs. The view calls the appropriate method on the controller. View objects, as always, use the controller to translate user actions into property updates on the model. In addition, changes in model state are communicated to view objects through an application's controller objects.

Version:
1.0 (Jan 2003) Updated:2010-10-05
Author:
Michael Kolling & Guillaume Legrain
